title: Name of typeface...again
content: I guess it didn't load...first time loading image...will try again.
author: mikeoconnor

comments.content: Hey, Mike, I think your image is still not posting. If you haven't done so, check out the [**Typophile Posting Guidelines**](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822224424/http:/typophile.com/readme) for tips on uploading images and PDFs.
